item.description:
Learn this ancient Japanese form of energy healing with Laura Joseph. Leave the class feeling confident and assured about performing Reiki on yourself, and others.

Students will learn the history of Reiki, Receive a Level 1Reiki Attunement, learn the basics of human energy and its relationship to health. This class is a hands-on experience where you will learn how to apply reiki to your plants, animals, family and for your own self healing. Laura goes beyond teaching reiki, but the basics and applications used in every day life, health, and interpersonal relationships.

Certification and course manual are provided. Wear comfortable clothing and bring a blanket, pillow, lunch and bottle of water. FREE Gift to all attendees.

Tuition: $150 or $285 for Couples
Members of the Spiritualist Church: $125
Refresher: $75 (Must show certificate)*

TO REGISTER:Â Laura at 781-422-2294

group.name: The First Spiritualist Church of Quincy

item.name: Usui Reiki I Class
